title: Horde Mode in League?
body:
Is it just me, or wouldn't the league champions fall perfectly into a team horde mode setting like Gears of War with increasing difficulty??? 

Or even boss fight battles with super difficult mechanics!

I personally would love something like this sometime down the pipelone!!

replies.body: i doubt they would bring in a different game mode that completely contradicts the genre MOBA, if you want raids go play wow or some %%%%
